title: Don't Trust Your Husband (1948 Comedy) They're burning the Scandal at both ends...

sources.title: Don't Trust Your Husband (1948 Comedy) They're burning the Scandal at both ends...
sources.description:
Vincent Doane (Fred MacMurray), an advertising executive, is determined to secure a lucrative account with his wealthy ex-fianc√©e, Margot Fraser (Louise Allbritton). To avoid arousing the jealousy of his wife, Paula (Madeleine Carroll), he conceals Margot's identity, referring to her as "Mr. Fraser." Suspicious of Vincent's behavior, Paula devises a plan to make him jealous by feigning interest in another man. Unbeknownst to her, this scheme entangles both of them in a series of comedic misunderstandings, testing the strength of their marriage.

Original title: An Innocent Affair (1948)
Alternative title: Don't Trust Your Husband

Director: Lloyd Bacon
Writers: Lou Breslow, Joseph Hoffman

Main actors:
Fred MacMurray - Vincent Doane
Madeleine Carroll - Paula Doane
Charles "Buddy" Rogers - Claude Kimball
Rita Johnson - Eve Lawrence
Louise Allbritton - Margot Fraser
Alan Mowbray - Ken St. Clair

Genres: Romantic Comedy, Drama
Release date: October 15, 1948 (United States)
